channel.title: Sleeping Issues

item.title: Sleeping Issues
item.dc:creator: @GothKing5000 GothKing5000
item.description:
@GothKing5000 wrote:

if (sleeping) {
	boolean drawEquation = true;
	gameGraphics.fadePixels();
	if(Math.random() < 0.14999999999999999D)
		gameGraphics.drawText("ZZZ", (int)(Math.random() * 80D), (int)(Math.random() * (double)windowHeight), 5, (int)(Math.random() * 16777215D));
	if(Math.random() < 0.14999999999999999D)
		gameGraphics.drawText("ZZZ", windowWidth - (int)(Math.random() * 80D), (int)(Math.random() * (double)windowHeight), 5, (int)(Math.random() * 16777215D));
	gameGraphics.drawText("You are Sleeping!", windowWidth / 2, 50, 7, 0xffffff);
	gameGraphics.drawText("Fatigue: " + (fatigue * 100) / 750 + "%", windowWidth / 2, 90, 7, 0xff0000);
	gameGraphics.drawText("When you want to wake up just use your", windowWidth / 2, 140, 5, 0xffffff);
	gameGraphics.drawText("keyboard to type the solution in the box below", windowWidth / 2, 160, 5, 0xffffff);
	gameGraphics.drawBox(windowWidth / 2 - 100, 160, 200, 40, 0);
	gameGraphics.drawText(super.inputText + "*", windowWidth / 2, 180, 5, 65535);
	if(sleepMessage != null) {
		gameGraphics.drawText(sleepMessage, windowWidth / 2, 260, 5, 0xff0000);
		drawEquation = false;
	}
	gameGraphics.drawImage(aGraphics936, 0, 0);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(windowWidth / 2 - 151, 229, 307, 50, 0x0000ff);
	drawChatMessageTabs();
	gameGraphics.drawText("If you can't read the equation", windowWidth / 2, 290, 1, 0xffffff);
	gameGraphics.drawText("@yel@click here@whi@ to get a different one", windowWidth / 2, 305, 1, 0xffffff);
	if (drawEquation && sleepEquation != null) {
		gameGraphics.drawImage(aGraphics936, windowWidth / 2 - 150, 230, sleepEquation);
	}
	return;
}

The question of the hour… why in the world does sleepEquation flicker???
and how to draw “ZZZ” randomly all over the screen but behind everything but the background?

mybad for wrong post section… TY for the move!
